description: Pasta with zucchini or pumpkin flowers. A very nice, light and fresh pasta for summer when zucchini and/or pumpkin bloom.

directions.step: Put a pot of water to boil.
Mince onion and saute in a large pan with the oil and some water to mellow out the onion flavor.
When onion begins to color, chop and add the flowers.
The water should now be close to boiling, so salt the water and when it boils, drop the pasta.
Let the flowers and onions cook and right before the pasta is ready add the chopped marjoram and season with salt and pepper to taste.
When the pasta is 'al dente' strain it and add it to the flowers and onion.
Put the pasta in plates, sprinkle Parmesan and grind some pepper over the top and serve!
Pasta ai Fiori di Zucca done.
